Summary: I was skeptical about booking this hotel due to others reviews. I did and thankful I did. It was exactly what I needed, a clean hotel to spend the night en route to another destination. Clean room, spacious , fridge and no one disturbing us.  Sure it was in a sketchy part of town, but maybe the whole town is?, Its not where I would live myself but exactly what I wanted and needed. I would recommend it for this purpose.  Myself and my 4 kiddos

We needed to stay in this area for a very early appointment the next morning and were just using the room for a place to sleep.  I hate to spend much whenever we need a place just to sleep verses staying for a few days or more.  So I decided to give this a try by booking through TripAdvisor.  Booking through TripAdvisor was a breeze, but the motel however was a disappointment.  On the plus side check-in was smooth and easy.  We arrived about 8pm and the lady behind the window was very nice and the aroma slipping through the pass through smelled delicious.  I think they were having dinner when we arrived.  I was presented with a credit card preauthorization which was higher than the amount quoted.  I asked why and she explained they charge a $20 refundable deposit.  So ok, paid

Summary Heading: Please stay away from this hotel, extremely bad service
Summary: good location for Vietnamese community, relatively clean for the money, bad service: we had booked 3-day stay, one 2-queen room for 4, from  7/1 > 7/3, arrived at 1:10' am 7/2, which was 1/2 day our loss, we were told checked in 10' late and  our booking had been cancelled , we had some unfriendly chats and they finally found only 1- bed room for our handicapped parents and sent us out roomless. We drove around the block at 1:30 midnight and found another nearby for 2 of us. Very bad experience towards small inns, motels
Room tip: close to heavy traffic road, Harbor and Westminster

Summary: The room was very clean as was the whole facility; it was also well lit.   Had a few problems receiving the digital TV stations, but it was a good stay.  There is a McDonalds right on the corner, and it was only a five minute walk.

We arrived at Disney without a reservation in June.  All the hotels were full or $300 a night.  It was nine at night and all we needed to do was sleep and go to Disney.  We were so lucky to find the West Coast motel.  The room was clean, great shower, good beds, micro and fridge for breakfast use, good ventilation and quiet for sleeping.  We paid 80 bucks.  We were at Disney in 15 minutes with slow road construction issues.  Went right to the Buzz Lightyear lot and then five minutes into the park.  Super great place if you do not need all the fluff.  McDonalds was very close too.

It's a pretty good room very nice but they told me it was gonna be $80 total and end up charging me 180 for the room but it's okay I'm enjoy this morning with my ex hopefully everything goes well with me and here I hope she loves it  The bed so soft is not like other hotels or motels nice room n size bathroom well done clean but I need more then one packet of coffee

I reserved a room with Jacuzzi last Friday, and it was amazing.there was a small TV screen on Jacuzzi tub and lights  in the tub.It made my day.It was less cheaper than other motels which are selling regular room in same price :) :)

Summary Heading: we loved the location and room
Summary: I loved the look.It is renovated and looks so beautiful.So clean it was.Price was good for nice rooms.they have Jacuzzi also.such a nice room it was.I recommend to choose this place for great value of your money.
It was newly renovated, beautiful property. Great rooms for a good price.
